snippet: The parent company of the Tribeca Film Festival is establishing Tribeca Firenze, a series of film programming that will run June 11 to June 18 as part of the Tuscan Sun Festival.
abstract: The parent company of the Tribeca Film Festival is establishing Tribeca Firenze, a series of film programming that will run June 11 to June 18 as part of the Tuscan Sun Festival.

headline.main: Offshoot of Tribeca Film Festival Coming to Florence
headline.print_headline: Tribeca Festival Offshoot Is Going to Florence
